name: Jerry
line: *singing* Last King Christmas last arrived!

name: Jerry
line: *singing* In the Christmas Christmas! *stops singing and smells the ham* Mmm... Jerry, you are really giving it to this ham.

name: Jerry
line: Um, Merry Christmas? *puts his hands on his hips* Helloooo? My parents are coming over for the first time in years! Can we stow the gadgets and look alive?

name: Beth
line: Alive? For your parents?

name: Jerry
line: Good one.

name: Beth
line: Hey man!

name: Jerry
line: You ‘hey man’! This holiday is about humanity.

name: Morty
line: *not looking up from his tablet* You know, I thought it was about being born half-God or something.

name: Jerry
line: Okay, whatever. All electronic items are going in the stocking. Now.

name: Morty
line: *hands over his tablet* Ohhhh...

name: Summer
line: Dad, I'm not giving you my phone.

name: Jerry
line: Put it in the stocking, Summer, or I'm joining Facebook.

name: Rick
line: *offscreen* Ho ho ho, everybody.

name: Jerry
line: More like whoa whoa whoa. What is this? My parents are coming!

name: Rick
line: Calm down Jerry, this is Ruben, an old friend.

name: Ruben
line: Pearl Harbor.

name: Rick
line: I check in on him once a year and give him a little *burp* medical *burp* evaluation.

name: Beth
line: Aw, Dad... That is so sweet.

name: Jerry
line: *squinting suspiciously* Yeah, it is... I don't get it.

name: Ruben
line: Korea.

name: Rick
line: Don't worry about your C-C-Christmas, Jerry. *leads Ruben away* Ruben and I'll be in my workshop while you have another day in Phil Collins’ proverbial paradise.

name: Jerry
line: Huh. You think you know a guy. (The doorbell rings.) Okay, there's my parents. Now remember, no TV, no phones, no laptops, we are connecting this Christmas, like old-school Jews on a Saturday. *opens the door* Hey hey!

name: Leonard
line: Merry Christmas, son.

name: Jerry
line: Oh, hi. Can I help you?

name: Joyce
line: Jerry, this is Jacob. *takes Jacob by the arm* Didn't you get our text message?

name: Beth, Summer, and Morty
line: No.

name: Jacob
line: You must be Jerry! That's a fine lookin’ apron. William Sonoma?

name: Jerry
line: *smiling uncomfortably* I wish... But thank you. *closes the door* So... you're a...friend of the family...?

name: Leonard
line: *puts an arm around Jacob's shoulders* The way we see it, he's a part of the family.

name: Jerry
line: Wow!

name: Joyce
line: After your father's brush with cancer and losing your uncle, we looked at life and wondered how have we spent it? And how do we spend the rest of it? What are we going to be when we die? A list of fears and questions, or a collection of real experiences?

name: Beth
line: Holy crap, Joyce. That's amazing.

name: Leonard
line: Then Jacob came into our lives. We’re learning to live again.

name: Jacob
line: All three of us.

name: Jerry
line: ...Cool... Eggnog?

name: Jacob
line: Now we are talkin’! This man's got the apron and the eggnog, huh?

name: Rick
line: Hi Joyce, Leonard. *looks at Jacob* Hello there.

name: Jacob
line: Merry Christmas, man.

name: Rick
line: Morty! A moment of your time?

name: Rick
line: He's in bad shape, Morty.

name: Morty
line: Aw geez, Rick! What did you do?

name: Rick
line: Gee, thanks Morty. What kind of monster do you think I am? I-I'm sittin’ here trying to save the guy's life! (Rick straps a pack with a tube onto Morty's back and puts an earpiece on his head.) I want you to find Dr. Xenon Bloom. He'll know what's goin’ on.

name: Morty
line: *extremely nervous* Uh... W-W-Where do I find Dr. Bloom?

name: Rick
line: In Ruben. *shoves a glass oxygen mask onto Morty's head*

name: Morty
line: Ruben... Minnesota?

name: Rick
line: Ruben on the table, Morty! *hooks up the backpack to the helmet* Look, I-I don't have time for you to wrap your little walnut around everything. *pulls a shrink ray into view and plugs it in* Hold your breath until the process is over or your lungs will collapse.

name: Morty
line: W-What proc—

name: Beth
line: Hey Dad, where's Morty?

name: Rick
line: He's busy.

name: Rick (through Morty's earpiece)
line: Morty, can you hear me? Head North!

name: Morty
line: Rick... Where am I?

name: Rick
line: *adjusts his own headset as he stands in the garage* Depending on my aim, you should be just south of the entrance.

name: Morty (through Rick's earpiece)
line: The entrance to what?

name: Rick
line: Welcome, Morty. (The scene cuts back to Morty's view from inside Ruben.) Welcome... (Morty gasps.) ...to Anatomy Park!

name: Rick
line: It's a little business venture I’ve been cookin’ up on the side with Dr. Bloom. (Morty enters the park.) An amusement park inside a human body. Science isn't cheap, Morty. This should really help put a dent in the overhead.

name: Morty
line: Oh my God! This is insane! Spleen Mountain? Bladder Falls? Pirates of the Pancreas?

name: Rick
line: You got a problem with that last one, Morty?

name: Morty
line: Huh? No, no, I'm just reading them out loud in the order I'm seeing them.

name: Rick
line: Okay, alright, if I sounded a little defensive, it's because Pirates of the Pancreas was my baby.

name: Rick
line: I-I got a lot of push-back when I pitched it, Morty. I guess I'm still a little defensive. Let's just find Dr. Bloom, alright? I-I'm picking up a distress signal in the liver, Morty.

name: Rick
line: Proceed to the liver.

name: Automated voice
line: Arriving at ‘Liver’.

name: Morty
line: *stumbles forward and hits his helmet on the window* Ow!

name: Automated voice
line: Mind the gap.

name: Morty
line: It's really scary in here, Rick.

name: Rick
line: Liver's under maintenance. Ruben's seen some rough years, Morty. Don't judge. You don't agree to have a theme park built inside you if your life's going great.

name: Morty
line: OOOOHHH! Rick, it's a monster!

name: Rick
line: No no, Morty. The only monster here is alco— *belch* —holism. (The wolf is mechanically pulled back into the wall.) That is an animatronic werewolf.

name: Poncho
line: Who are you? Answer me! Where did you come from?

name: Morty
line: Mmm! M-M-My-my-my Grandpa Rick sent me!

name: Dr. Bloom
line: Poncho! That's quite enough.

name: Dr. Bloom
line: Morty, that's Poncho. (Another man and a girl walk into the room.) This is Roger and Annie.

name: Morty
line: *staring sheepishly at Annie* Oh...

name: Dr. Bloom
line: And I am Dr. Xenon Bloom.

name: Rick
line: Hey Bloom, it's Rick. What the hell's goin’ on here?

name: Dr. Bloom
line: I don't know why, but the entire security system has shut down. And I'm afraid the exhibits are unlocked.

name: Morty
line: Exhibits?

name: Dr. Bloom
line: Anatomy Park's greatest attraction, young man, isn't the music or the food or the Pirates of the Pancreas.

name: Rick
line: Watch it.

name: Dr. Bloom
line: It is first and foremost a living museum of humanity's most noble and ferocious diseases.

name: Morty
line: Diseases?!

name: Poncho
line: Hey Doc, I have news for ya. (Hepatitis A lumbers towards the group.) Your living museum is officially a wild safari!

name: Roger
line: Hepatitis A! Run!

name: Jacob
line: Oh... *leans over and wipes some food from Joyce's mouth with a napkin* The food goes in your mouth, girl!

name: Jerry
line: Aha... I'm sorry Jacob, I guess I'm still confused about the precise nature and origin of your relationship with my parents. Are you like a—Are you like their caretaker? Is that what it is?

name: Joyce
line: We can go into detail later, son.

name: Leonard
line: Now wait, there, there's no point to secrecy. Let's all live and die honestly. Your mother and I have shared forty years of each other, mind, body, and soul. (Jerry and Jacob smile at each other, but when Jacob looks away, Jerry's smile becomes a glare.) And when minds and souls are joined for eternity, and when eternity is at the door, it's an invitation to let go of the body, and an opportunity to share and experiment.

name: Jerry
line: Dad, please, what are you saying?

name: Beth
line: Whatever it is, it's beautiful, Leonard. *glares at Jerry* And we support you.

name: Jerry
line: Speak for yourself! Because it, heheh, it sounds like you're about to say Jacob is your lover.

name: Leonard
line: No no no no. (Jerry sighs in relief.) Jacob is your mother's lover. (Jerry again looks disturbed.) I watch them. Sometimes from a chair, sometimes from a closet. Almost always dressed as Superman.

name: Jacob
line: Oh... *reaches across the table and puts a hand atop theirs*

name: Jacob
line: Jerry, this ham's got to be all you, right? It's in-cred-i-ble.

name: Summer
line: *smirks* Happy human holiday, Dad.

name: Poncho
line: AHHHHHH!

name: Dr. Bloom
line: Hepatitis won't follow us into the respiratory system!

name: Roger
line: That's strange... *taps the meter* Air flow is down twenty percent.

name: Dr. Bloom
line: So the brain isn't getting enough oxygen. That's why security is offline.

name: Morty
line: W-Well, I guess we better check it out.

name: Alexander
line: Hey, wait for me! *removes the head of his costume*

name: Dr. Bloom
line: *points his cane at Alexander* Put that back on!

name: Roger
line: If we got up to the bronchial catwalk, we could look for blockage.

name: Morty
line: *raises his hand* I'll go. *glances at Annie* Heheh...

name: Poncho
line: Don't be a hero, kid.

name: Morty
line: I'm not. I'm doin’ it because it's fun. *he hops from frond to frond*

name: Poncho
line: *cocks his gun* We shouldn't be here.

name: Dr. Bloom
line: Whatever you do, don't fire that thing in here! We must save Ruben. This is my life's work.

name: Annie
line: Ah!

name: Dr. Bloom
line: It's alright, my dear. Nearly all human lungs contain a strain of this bacteria, but the scar tissue... *prods it with his cane, seeing something has escaped from the scar tissue* ...keeps them dormant. *looks up toward Morty, who is getting close to the catwalk* Morty! Get down!

name: Morty
line: Whoa! *grabs hold of the catwalk as a fluid drips down onto it* Whoa!

name: Morty
line: Oh! What are those things?!

name: Dr. Bloom
line: Tuberculosis, coming in fast!

name: Poncho
line: *raises gun and starts shooting at the disease* Not faster than a bullet! Ahh!

name: Dr. Bloom
line: *grabs Poncho's arm* No! Do you know what you've done?!

name: Dr. Bloom
line: Get to the digestive tract! He's coughing!

name: Alexander
line: Waaaah! Don't let me die!

name: Rick
line: Just take a deep breath, Ruben.

name: Morty
line: You're not gonna die! What's your name?

name: Alexander
line: My name is... *his hand slips from Morty's and he's coughed up* ALEXANDEEEEEEEER!

name: Morty
line: Rick! Ruben's got tuberculosis!

name: Rick
line: Oh, great work, Morty. *pulls a massive syringe form his lab coat* I'll just cure it, and then—

name: Rick
line: Okay. Well I can't cure death. This is bad, Morty. You're trapped in a dead man. Listen, if the situation keeps darkening, do yourself a favor—

name: Rick
line: —and hop by Pirates of the Pancreas. Obviously I'm biased, but, I think it's great, Morty.

name: Rick
line: *sitting in a lounge chair, pulls out a flask* It's a bunch of pirates runnin’ around a-a-a- pancreas. We don't whitewash it either, Morty. The pirates are really rapey. The top priority is to get you guys out of there, but I'm just saying, if that becomes impossible—

name: Rick
line: —please, you gotta treat yourself.

name: Morty
line: Geez, what's that horrible smell?

name: Dr. Bloom
line: You mean the Panda Express? *chuckles* Kidding, I-I'm kidding. (As he speaks, Poncho and Roger stock up on bottled water from the Panda Express.) The body is beginning to constrict and fill with gas. We’re inside a corpse, my boy. Anatomy Park is doomed.

name: Morty
line: Forget about the park, Doctor! How do we get out?!

name: Dr. Bloom
line: The digestive tract is the evacuation route. Get it? There's an emergency station in the colon with a ray that can enlarge us all.

name: Morty
line: Everybody! Get to the colon!

name: Poncho
line: Now I'm takin’ orders from a twelve-year-old boy?!

name: Dr. Bloom
line: Morty. The scar sacs containing the tuberculosis were sabotaged. This disaster was an inside job. Keep your eyes on Annie. She was written up several times by her manager at the churro stand.

name: Roger
line: Intestines are ahead to the left. Then the right. Then left. Et cetera.

name: Morty
line: Hey, just so you know, I-I'm actually fourteen. So, you know...

name: Annie
line: What?

name: Morty
line: Not twelve.

name: Annie
line: Okay.

name: Morty
line: Because he just said I was twelve.

name: Annie
line: Oh. Good for you.

name: Rick (through speaker)
line: Oh. Oh, Morty. Strike one.

name: Morty
line: *slumps forward* Nnn...

name: Animatronics
line: *singing* It's a road of laughter, a trail of food. It's a pathway that breaks up the fat in food. It's a tube in the chest and it sends out the rest. It's a small, small intestine!

name: Roger
line: It goes on like this for miles...

name: Dr. Bloom
line: *excitedly* And then we get to the large intestine!

name: Poncho
line: Shh. *shines flashlight* I hear something.

name: Dr. Bloom
line: *whispers* Don't move. Gonorrhea can't see us if we don't move.

name: Dr. Bloom
line: Wait! I was wrong! I was thinking of a T-rex.

name: Annie
line: We’re sitting ducks!

name: Morty
line: Doc! Didn't you say the body was filling up with gas?

name: Dr. Bloom
line: Yes. Why?

name: Poncho
line: Kid! You're a genius! *pulls out a match*

name: Dr. Bloom
line: Are you mad?!

name: Morty
line: *grabs Annie's hand* Everybody! In here!

name: Poncho
line: Hey Gonorrhea! How's this for a burning sensation?

name: Summer
line: *singing* Drummer, drum, drum, drum! Drummer, drum, drum drum drum, Christmas drums!

name: Leonard
line: Oh, Summer. Sing it! Haha.

name: Summer
line: Christmas drums being played by a boy!

name: Beth
line: Jerry, come on. This is what you wanted.

name: Jerry
line: I get it, Beth. Be careful what you wish for. I'm being punished for taking your iPad.

name: Beth
line: What? Jerry, let that stuff go, okay? I'm sorry I was a bitch earlier. Let's just be here.

name: Ethan
line: Ugh... Summer!

name: Summer
line: *stands up* Ethan, what are you doing here?

name: Ethan
line: I’ve been texting you for hours. What the hell?!

name: Summer
line: I don't have my phone! I'm doing a human holiday!

name: Ethan
line: Did you even consider how that might make me feel?

name: Summer
line: How you feel? Why is everything always happening to you?!

name: Jerry
line: *stands up* Summer, do you have a boyfriend?

name: Ethan
line: Yeah, do you, Summer?

name: Summer
line: I don't know Ethan, do I?

name: Jacob
line: *stands up and puts a hand on Ethan and Summer's shoulders* Jerry, no disrespect, but you really need to connect more with your family, man.

name: Roger
line: I should be able to access the backup generator to get the growth ray back online. If it works, we'll be regular-sized in a few minutes. I just hope Ruben's not in a room with white carpets or upholstery.

name: Poncho
line: What the hell is that?

name: Dr. Bloom
line: The sphincter dam. We built it when Ruben became incontinent, but it was not designed to hold a corpse-load.

name: Roger
line: Almost got it. Everybody, move inside the circle!

name: Morty
line: Poncho? What is this in your backpack?

name: Dr. Bloom
line: That's bubonic plague! What are you doing with that, Poncho?

name: Poncho
line: Everybody get back!

name: Dr. Bloom
line: Poncho, you son of a bitch! You released the tuberculosis so you could steal from me?

name: Poncho
line: *laughs* That's right, baby. A lot of people would pay top dollar to decimate the population. I'll take the highest bidder. Al Quaeda. North Korea. Republicans! Shriners! Balding men that work out! People on the Internet that are only turned on by cartoons of Japanese teenagers! Anything is better than working for you! *points the knife at Dr. Bloom* You pompous, negligent, iTunes Gift Card as a holiday bonus-giving—

name: Morty
line: AHHHHH!!!

name: Poncho
line: Ah! Eh! Get! Get off! *he backs up and falls over the railing* Ahhhh!

name: Annie
line: You guys!

name: Roger
line: It's gonna burst! *urges the others on* Go! Go, go, go! *pulls a lever before trying to run after the others but catches his foot in some of the machinery* My foot is stuck!

name: Annie
line: No!

name: Roger
line: This is okay! It's okay, just go! Tell my family I love them! They may be hard to find because my wife kept her last name and she made the kids take it too, so, I dunno, you could goo—

name: Annie
line: No!

name: Jacob
line: Let me ask you something Ethan. Where's the anger coming from, man?

name: Ethan
line: From Summer being a total bitch!

name: Jacob
line: Where's the anger coming from?

name: Ethan
line: ...My brother... took me fishing once...in the bushes... *voice begins choking up as tears fill his eyes* I can't... I can't! *covers his eyes as he starts to cry* He made me feel like a girl! *sobbing openly* I'm... m-made me a girl!

name: Jacob
line: He didn't make you anything, man. You are who you are. *gestures to Summer* She is who she is. (Summer watches on with a sympathetic expression.) Now you go to her. Brand new.

name: Ethan
line: Come here right now!

name: Summer
line: Oh my god, I'm so sorry Ethan! *they hug* I love you!

name: Ethan
line: I love you so much.

name: Jerry
line: Um...

name: Joyce
line: You did it again, cubby. Come here.

name: Jerry
line: No! Stop! I hate this!

name: Joyce
line: Well, Christmas doesn't revolve around what you hate, son.

name: Jerry
line: Well then, I hate Christmas! Enjoy being human! You guys are gross and lame.

name: Animatronic Ruben
line: My name's Ruben Ridley. You're inside me right now, but by the end of this journey, I'll be inside all of you.

name: Animatronic Ruben
line: My story begins in the dot com crash in the early ‘90s.

name: Annie
line: *whispering to Morty* You can put your fingers wherever you want…

name: Rick (through speaker)
line: Morty, you wanna put it on mute or something? (Annie and Morty both look at Morty’s helmet, startled.)

name: Rick
line: I’m trying to concentrate.

name: Jerry
line: Ah, Rick?

name: Rick
line: *holds up a hand without even looking over at him* Not now, Jerry. I’ve got much, much smaller fish to fry.

name: Jerry
line: *enters anyway* I wanted to say I’m sorry I ever judged you. *leans on the ping pong table, looking down at Ruben’s corpse* Right now, you’re my sanest relative.

name: Rick
line: Relative… That’s it! Relative size! Jerry, hand me a scalpel and a bundle of dynamite! *into his headset* Morty! Can you get to the left nipple?

name: Morty
line: Are you kidding? I’m hoping I can get to both of them, Rick.

name: Rick (through speaker)
line: Morty, I’m talkin’ about Ruben's left nipple!

name: Morty
line: We need to get to the left nipple!

name: Dr. Bloom
line: The body is decaying! (Bits of debris begin to fall from the ‘ceiling’.) The arterial transit system is useless! We can try the service shuttle. It's connected to the skeletal system. That's why we call it the Bone Train. *to Annie* Would you like to ride the Bone Train, miss?

name: Annie
line: If it'll get us out of here.

name: Dr. Bloom
line: How about you, Morty? Would you like to ride the Bone Train?

name: Morty
line: Why are you doing this bit? We’re gonna die. Let's go.

name: Jerry
line: Well, I can see that you're busy... Merry Christmas, Rick.

name: Dr. Bloom
line: There's no autopilot. One of us will have to stay here and operate it manually.

name: Morty
line: ...Uh, well...

name: Dr. Bloom
line: No, you're right. It was a dick move for me to even pause like that. This is all my fault. You go on.

name: Annie
line: *points* What the hell is that?

name: Dr. Bloom
line: E. coli outbreak. Hurry!

name: Dr. Bloom
line: Oh wait, there is an autopilot. (E. coli surround him.) WAAAIT! ...OKAY, NEVER MIND, I WANTED TO SACRIFICE MYSELF ANYWAAAAAYYYY!

name: Annie
line: They're chewing through the doors!

name: Morty
line: Euuuugh! *grabs a fire extinguisher and beats the E. coli off the train with it* We’re in the areola, Rick! Almost to the nipple! But we’re also in a really bad situation!

name: Rick
line: I'm almost there, Morty!

name: Reporter
line: Reports are coming in from across the country about what appears to be a giant naked man over the continental United States. We now go to Tom Randolph in New York. Tom?

name: Tom
line: Well, his eyes aren't twinkling, and his dimples aren't merry, but I'm standing under a nose like a seventy-mile cherry!

name: Reporter
line: Thank you, Tom. Let's go now to Eric McMan in Los Angeles.

name: Eric
line: We’ve got feet here on the West Coast, Bill! Giant feet, even relative to the giant man's size! And you know what they say about that!

name: Reporter
line: Well, if the old adage is true, one can only wonder what is going down in the Rocky Mountains.

name: Morty
line: Oh my god, the track!

name: Annie
line: It's Hepatitis A!

name: Annie
line: The nipple hole...

name: Morty
line: It's beautiful...

name: Annie
line: Aw no!

name: Annie
line: Whoa! It's Hepatitis C!

name: Morty
line: Um... We... Did we have some sort of relationship with him?

name: Annie
line: I... think they're just like that? I think they're just good guys.

name: Morty
line: Oh. Huh.

name: Rick
line: Where's Dr. Bloom?

name: Morty
line: Sorry Rick... He's dead...

name: Rick
line: Goddamn it, Morty, I ask you to do one thing!

name: Beth
line: Jerry doesn't know what he's missing.

name: Jacob
line: He'll come around, Beth. Christmas is a special time. It has funny ways of bringing families together.

name: Beth
line: I dunno, Jacob. Jerry got an invitation to be alive today, and he rejected it. I don't know if our marriage will—

name: Summer
line: It's raining blood!

name: Jacob
line: Oh, shit. find Jerry!

name: Beth
line: Oh god.

name: Beth
line: Jerry!

name: Jerry
line: *stands and hugs her* It's alright! The TV says there's nothing to worry about.

name: Reporter (on TV)
line: The giant naked sky Santa has exploded. Blood and chunks of viscera are raining down on the country. Everything should be fine.

name: Summer
line: Dad, can I have my phone back?

name: Jerry
line: Sure, sweetie. *pulls out the stocking and gives Summer her phone, then gives Beth her tablet* Everybody, take a device. It'll help you relax.

name: Jacob
line: This is nice.

name: Jerry
line: Yeah. *puts an arm around Beth and Jacob* I guess we really learned something this Christmas, Jacob.

name: Summer
line: No we didn't, Dad. No we didn't.

name: Rick
line: Too bad about Dr. Bloom. *Rick, Annie, and Morty exit the car* He was a genius. The only man capable of creating a new Anatomy Park.

name: Annie
line: Actually, I studied Dr. Bloom's work. I believe I have the knowledge necessary to create a new, much safer park!

name: Rick
line: What about Pirates of the Pancreas...?

name: Annie
line: I think it was one of the most underrated attractions.

name: Rick
line: Booyah! Hold your breath!

name: Morty
line: Hey, wh-wh- What the hell, Rick? What the hell, man? I liked her! I really had somethin’ going there, Rick!

name: Rick
line: Yeah, so I heard. You dodged a bullet, Morty, trust me. *whispers* Puffy vagina.

name: Morty
line: W-What's wrong with that? That doesn't sound like a problem to me! I dunno!

name: Rick
line: C’mon. Let's get some stuffing, I'm starving.

name: Rick
line: Oh, unbelievable. We got a bunch of robot computer people sittin’ around with their faces stuffed in computer screens. (No one acknowledges him.) Do you realize Christ was born today? Jesus Christ our Savior was born today! A-A-A-Are you people even human? What kind of Christmas is this?

name: Annie (through speaker phone)
line: Hey Rick! Rick, can you hear me?

name: Rick
line: Loud and clear, Annie.

name: Annie
line: Great! We’re also on with Alejandro, our Chief Imaginarian—

name: Alejandro
line: Hey Rick.

name: Annie
line: Natalie Jacobs and Chris Desiter from Microscopic Marketing, Zach from Organ Concepts and Jamie from New Media.

name: Rick
line: Hey everybody.

name: All
line: Hey, hi Rick, how's it goin’. (etc.)

name: Annie
line: So. Pirates of the Pancreas.

name: Rick
line: Yeah, talk to me.

name: Alejandro
line: Hey Rick, it's Alejandro speaking. Um, so we asked ourselves internally, we asked ourselves over here, “Okay, what does a pancreas do?” (Rick begins to look agitated.) And the answer was, does it make pirates? No. It makes insulin, you know? So we’re starting with a new—

name: Ethan
line: So those guys are inside me, huh? Like, building a park?

name: Rick
line: Those guys are inside you building a piece of shit, Ethan! They're inside you building a monument to compromise! Fuck 'em. Fuck those people. Fuck this whole thing, Ethan.

name: Ethan
line: ... Cool. And who pays me?
